Crushes enemies in range with a powerful force of gravity for 3 seconds. This affects your movement as well.  \n#yDark Attribute\nMagic Attack Power: {0}% + {1}
Summons a portal that rains meteors on the land. A protective sphere shields you from enemies during this spell.\n#yDark Magic\nMagic Damage: {0}% + {1}
Shoots an orb of gravity the pierces enemies and explodes, dealing damage. \n#yDark Magic\nMagic Attack Power: {0}% + {1}
Summons three void orbs that deal massive damage. \n#yDark Magic\nMagic Attack Power: {0}% + {1}
A black hole forms 7m in front of you and sucks in nearby targets. \n#yDark Magic\nMagic Attack Power: {0}% + {1}
Shoots forth a powerful ray of light. \n#yMagic Attack Power: {0}% + {1}
